rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted.)[/i]
When this battle enters, choose one–
• Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
• Create a 4/4 red Demon creature token with flying and trample.
rules_text2:
Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
